name: Horror room
description:
When you are in a dark and mysterious room, what will you do?

This is a horror game which need the player to find the right password to escape the room. USE "WASD" and mouse click to find some clues. 

To get the key, press "E", to open the flashlight, press "X", to open the door, press "E", to open the keypad, press "E". 

Also, BE CAREFUL !!!! there are some "jump scare" will appear when the player near something

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!IMPORTANT
Use earphone when play this game!!!
